title: The display property of an item set to "none" does not take effect in the new PDF emitter
OB: When the display property of an item is set to "none" in the new PDF emitter, it is not being correctly hidden in the generated PDF document.
EB: The display property of an item set to "none" should hide the item in the generated PDF document.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Create a new PDF document using the new PDF emitter. 2. Set the display property of an item to "none". 3. Generate the PDF document and verify that the item is still visible.
